picked_headlines.summary: AI-driven system enhances market forecasting and content analytics.
picked_headlines.reason_for_choice: This article bridges AI technology with business applications, making it relevant for both technical and management audiences interested in market analytics.

picked_headlines.summary: Dataset for autonomous driving in rare scenarios.
picked_headlines.reason_for_choice: This article is crucial for engineering and product development, focusing on enhancing autonomous driving technology through a new dataset.

digest:
- *EnchTable*: Enhances safety alignment in LLMs, ensuring ethical outputs without retraining. *https://arxiv.org/abs/2511.09880*
- *Scalable Synthesis*: Facilitates scalable modeling for LLM workloads, optimizing diverse architectures. *https://arxiv.org/abs/2511.10480*
- *HierRouter*: Optimizes LLM inference by routing to specialized models, reducing costs. *https://arxiv.org/abs/2511.09873*
- *HeatGen*: Introduces a framework for optimizing heat sink designs, achieving efficient inference. *https://arxiv.org/abs/2511.09578*
- *Phantom Menace*: Explores vulnerabilities in Vision-Language-Action models, proposing robustness enhancements. *https://arxiv.org/abs/2511.10008*
- *Opinion: UEPO*: Offers a framework for robust robot learning, improving policy diversity. *https://arxiv.org/abs/2511.10087*
- *AlignSurvey*: Benchmarks human preferences in social surveys, enhancing survey processes with LLMs. *https://arxiv.org/abs/2511.07871*
- *TawPipe*: Enhances weight pipeline parallelism for LLMs, optimizing communication. *https://arxiv.org/abs/2511.09741*
- *FactGuard*: Enhances fake news detection using LLMs, improving accuracy in resource-constrained settings. *https://arxiv.org/abs/2511.10281*
- *Torch-Uncertainty*: A PyTorch framework for improving uncertainty quantification in predictions. *https://arxiv.org/abs/2511.10282*
- *Omnilingual ASR*: Open-source multilingual speech recognition for 1,600+ languages, enhancing accessibility. *https://arxiv.org/abs/2511.09690*
